scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.publish:subgraph-user: npm run merge:subgraph-user-schema && rover subgraph publish WWW-Articles@current --schema ./user-subgraph/src/schema.graphql --name user-subgraph --routing-url http://localhost:4001
scripts.publish:subgraph-articles: npm run merge:subgraph-articles-schema && rover subgraph publish WWW-Articles@current --schema ./articles-subgraph/src/schema.graphql --name articles-subgraph --routing-url http://localhost:4002
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:subgraph-user && npm run publish:subgraph-articles
scripts.start:explorer: concurrently --kill-others --names 'router, subgraph-user, subgraph-articles' --prefix-colors 'blue,magenta,green' --prefix '[:name]' 'npm run start:router' 'npm run start:subgraph-user' 'npm run start:subgraph-articles'
scripts.start:subgraphs: concurrently --kill-others --names 'merge:subgraph-user-schema, merge:subgraph-articles-schema, start:subgraph-user, start:subgraph-articles' --prefix-colors 'blue,magenta,green,blue' --prefix '[:name]' 'npm run merge:subgraph-user-schema' 'npm run merge:subgraph-articles-schema' 'npm run start:subgraph-user' 'npm run start:subgraph-articles'
